Settings Send Feedback Visit Our Website About Us Our Mission The Team
Created by Cornell AppDev, Volume aims to better connect student publications with student readers by making it easy and accessible to digest student created content. Volume believes in the unique power that lies in the sharing and distribution of content by students and for students to spark conversation, experiences, and connections that improve the collegiate experience.
The founding members that together made Volume a reality âœ¨
